products.name: ModalAI VOXL 2
products.description: The ModalAI VOXL 2 is a powerful computing platform designed for autonomous drones and robots. It features advanced processing capabilities, multiple camera inputs, and integrated connectivity options.
faqs: Q: What is the ModalAI VOXL 2? A: The ModalAI VOXL 2 is a powerful computing platform designed for autonomous drones and robots, featuring advanced processing capabilities and multiple connectivity options.
Q: What processor does the VOXL 2 use? A: The VOXL 2 uses a Qualcomm QRB5165 processor.
Q: How much RAM does the VOXL 2 have? A: The VOXL 2 comes with 8GB of LPDDR5 RAM.

products.name: DroneX Pro
products.description: The DroneX Pro is a compact, foldable drone with 4K camera capabilities, designed for both beginners and experienced pilots. It offers stable flight performance and high-quality aerial photography.
faqs: Q: What is the DroneX Pro? A: The DroneX Pro is a compact, foldable drone with a 4K camera, designed for both beginners and experienced pilots.
Q: How long can the DroneX Pro fly? A: The DroneX Pro can fly for approximately 30 minutes on a single battery charge.
Q: Is the DroneX Pro suitable for beginners? A: Yes, the DroneX Pro has several beginner-friendly features like headless mode and one-key takeoff/landing.
